name: ChargeItem
title: ChargeItem
description: The resource ChargeItem describes the provision of healthcare provider products for a certain patient, therefore referring not only to the product, but containing in addition details of the provision, like date, time, amounts and participating organizations and persons.

elements.name: ChargeItem
elements.description: The resource ChargeItem describes the provision of healthcare provider products for a certain patient.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifiers assigned to this event performer or other systems.

elements.name: definitionUri
elements.description: References the (external) source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

elements.name: definitionCanonical
elements.description: References the source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The current state of the ChargeItem.

elements.name: partOf
elements.description: ChargeItems can be grouped to larger ChargeItems covering the whole set.

elements.name: code
elements.description: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code.

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The individual or set of individuals the action is being or was performed on.

elements.name: context
elements.description: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this event.

elements.name: occurrenceDateTime
elements.description: Date/time(s) or duration when the charged service was applied.

elements.name: occurrencePeriod
elements.description: Date/time(s) or duration when the charged service was applied.

elements.name: occurrenceTiming
elements.description: Date/time(s) or duration when the charged service was applied.

elements.name: performer
elements.description: Indicates who or what performed or participated in the charged service.

elements.name: performingOrganization
elements.description: The organization requesting the service.

elements.name: requestingOrganization
elements.description: The organization performing the service.

elements.name: costCenter
elements.description: The financial cost center permits the tracking of charge attribution.

elements.name: quantity
elements.description: Quantity of which the charge item has been serviced.

elements.name: bodysite
elements.description: The anatomical location where the related service has been applied.

elements.name: factorOverride
elements.description: Factor overriding the factor determined by the rules associated with the code.

elements.name: priceOverride
elements.description: Total price of the charge overriding the list price associated with the code.

elements.name: overrideReason
elements.description: If the list price or the rule-based factor associated with the code is overridden, this attribute can capture a text to indicate the reason for this action.

elements.name: enterer
elements.description: The device, practitioner, etc. who entered the charge item.

elements.name: enteredDate
elements.description: Date the charge item was entered.

elements.name: reason
elements.description: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

elements.name: service
elements.description: Indicated the rendered service that caused this charge.

elements.name: productReference
elements.description: Identifies the device, food, drug or other product being charged either by type code or reference to an instance.

elements.name: productCodeableConcept
elements.description: Identifies the device, food, drug or other product being charged either by type code or reference to an instance.

elements.name: account
elements.description: Account into which this ChargeItems belongs.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Comments made about the event by the performer, subject or other participants.

elements.name: supportingInformation
elements.description: Further information supporting this charge.
